include($ENV{PW_ROOT}/pw_build/pigweed.cmake)

pw_auto_add_simple_module(pw_blob_store
  PUBLIC_DEPS
    pw_containers
    pw_kvs
    pw_span
    pw_status
    pw_stream
  PRIVATE_DEPS
    pw_assert
    pw_checksum
    pw_log
    pw_random
    pw_string
)
